c74object.name: cage.sdif.peaks.toroll
c74object.digest: Import a peaks SDIF analysis into a bach.roll
c74object.description: Imports and displays a peaks SDIF analysis into a bach.roll object. Each stream is mapped to a different voice. Each peak is output as a note.

inlet.description: The SDIF analysis containing peaks information, as the one output by bach.readsdif.
Peaks amplitudes output from this lambda outlet can be mapped into velocities to be re-injected into this lambda inlet.

outlet.description: Peaks amplitudes are output from this lambda outlet. Such amplitudes might be mapped into velocities to be re-injected into the lambda inlet.

method.name: bang
method.description: Output the information imported from the most recently input analysis llll.

method.name: llll
method.description:
An llll in first inlet is expected to contain the llll form of a partial tracking SDIF analysis (as the one output by bach.readsdif). The output bach.roll's gathered syntax is sent through from the outlet (each SDIF stream corresponding to a voice).
An llll in second inlet is converted into an int.

attribute.name: ampslot
attribute.description: Sets the number of the (float) slot which will contain the amplitude of each peak, or leave 0 to ignore it (default).

attribute.name: confidenceslot
attribute.description: Sets the number of the (float) slot which will contain the confidence of each peak, or leave 0 to ignore it (default).

attribute.name: freqrange
attribute.description: Sets a custom frequency range for outputting peaks: a minimum frequency and a maximum frequency, both in Hertz. Default frequency range is 20 Hz to 20000 Hz.

attribute.name: minamp
attribute.description: Sets a minimum amplitude threshold for a peak to be output. Default is 0.001.

attribute.name: minconfidence
attribute.description: Sets a minimum confidence threshold for a peak to be output. Default is 0.001.

attribute.name: phaseslot
attribute.description: Sets the number of the (float) slot which will contain the phase of each peak, or leave 0 to ignore it (default).

entry.name: Inlet 1 (llll)
entry.description: SDIF analysis as llll. The SDIF analysis containing peaks information, as the one output by bach.readsdif.

entry.name: Inlet 2 (llll)
entry.description: Lambda inlet. Peaks amplitudes output from this lambda outlet can be mapped into velocities to be re-injected into this lambda inlet.

entry.name: Outlet 2 (llll)
entry.description: Lambda outlet. Peaks amplitudes are output from this lambda outlet. Such amplitudes might be mapped into velocities to be re-injected into the lambda inlet.
